Sentencas: 15-layer rhombohedral (15R) SrCrO2.8-type superstructures have been discovered in Sr(Cr1-xFex)O3-y perovskites (0.4 <= x <= 0.6; space group R (3) over barm; a approximate to 5.56 and c approximate to 34.6 angstrom).
Titulo: Cation, Vacancy, and Spin Ordered 15R-Superstructures in Sr(Cr1-xFex)O3-y (0.4 ≤ x ≤ 0.6) Perovskites

Sentencas: Cr/Fe cations are segregated between layers of tetrahedrally and octahedrally coordinated sites.
Titulo: Cation, Vacancy, and Spin Ordered 15R-Superstructures in Sr(Cr1-xFex)O3-y (0.4 ≤ x ≤ 0.6) Perovskites

Sentencas: The 15R-Sr(Cr1-xFex)O3-y materials are semiconducting and order ferrimagnetically below 225-342 K.
Titulo: Cation, Vacancy, and Spin Ordered 15R-Superstructures in Sr(Cr1-xFex)O3-y (0.4 ≤ x ≤ 0.6) Perovskites

Sentencas: The magnetic structure of an x = 0.5 sample shows spin canting consistent with a simple spin disorder model.
Titulo: Cation, Vacancy, and Spin Ordered 15R-Superstructures in Sr(Cr1-xFex)O3-y (0.4 ≤ x ≤ 0.6) Perovskites

Sentencas: Samples with x >= 0.7 have a disordered cubic perovskite structure, and we propose that locally reconstructed (111) planes like those in the 15R materials facilitate oxide ion migration in Cr-based perovskite mixed conductors used in solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Cation, Vacancy, and Spin Ordered 15R-Superstructures in Sr(Cr1-xFex)O3-y (0.4 ≤ x ≤ 0.6) Perovskites
